pages.text: Further expanding the utility of the $(l:useful_things/building_tools/transferrence_tome)Tome of Transferrence$(), you can use $(item)Templates$() to store copied structures for later reuse, both as an item, and as a text string that can be shared with other people.$(br)All of this is done with the $(item)Template Manager$()

pages.heading: Template Manager
pages.description: Used to write $(thing)Templates$() to/from $(item)Paper$() and the $(item)Tome of Transferrence$().

pages.title: Template Manager
pages.text: $(l)Save:$() Saves the structure stored in the $(item)Template$() or $(item)Tome of Transferrence$()in the left slot to a $(item)Template$() or piece of $(item)Paper$() in the right slot.$(br2)$(l)Load:$() Loads the structure from a $(item)Template$() in the right slot to a $(item)Tome$() or $(item)Template$() in the left slot.

$(l)Copy:$() Copies the structure from a $(item)Tome$() or $(item)Template$() in the left slot directly to your computer clipboard for sharing with others.$(br2)$(l)Paste:$() Paste structure data from your computer clipboard onto a $(item)Template$() or piece of $(item)Paper$() in the right slot. Many premade templates for various multiblock structures such as altars are available in the Multiblock Index.
